channel.title: Web Development on

item.title: Web Development
item.description:
In this project, our focus was on back-end development. We utilized the JavaServer Faces framework to handle the application’s logic, ensuring smooth interactions with the database. To meet the requirements, we relied on SQL stored procedures for querying the database. As a result, we constructed multiple stored procedures and jobs to fulfill the project’s needs.

Tools: SQL Management Studio and Eclipse.
Languajes: SQL, Java, HTML,JavaScript and CSS

Due to confidentiality issues, not images cannot be showed.
